page.title: 03Friday at school in Culcheth
page.content: My day starts at 8.00 a.m. when I go and get washed. Then I watch T.V. while I eat my cornflakes. At 8.40 a.m. I leave for school. After our teacher has called the register we go into assembly. Then we all read until about 9.40a.m., when we do English. At 10.40a.m. we have fifteen minutes playtime outside. Next we come in and do Mathematics. At 12.00p.m. I go home for my dinner. At 1.15p.m. we do games and then at 2.30p.m. I go out to play and later at 2.50p.m I come in and do topic.Then at 3.45p.m. we go home.
